thread.title: We Are All John Goodman When Jeff Bridges Revives The Dude From The Big Lebowski
thread.title_full: We Are All John Goodman When Jeff Bridges Revives The Dude From The Big Lebowski

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: We Are All John Goodman When Jeff Bridges Revives The Dude From The Big Lebowski
text:
Jeff Bridges Does The Big Lebowski For John Goodman We Are All John Goodman When Jeff Bridges Revives The Dude From The Big Lebowski March 10, 2017 35 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
John Goodman received a long-deserved star on Hollywood's Walk of Fame on Friday, and a miracle occurred: Jeff Bridges brought The Dude out of retirement. The two pals famously costarred in 1998's The Big Lebowski , and Goodman was delighted to see that Bridges had brought along his oversize sweater in honor of the occasion. Not only did Bridges dress the part, but he gave his whole speech in Dude mode. Let us treasure this moment.
